posts.post_title: 2 T206s and a Chase T201 Mecca Double Fold F/S
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe Drouillard
Hello All,

I have this T201 Chase for sale. There are no creases, paper loss. Loks like two marks on the back. Small written "n" below the "E" in Mecca and "E" in cigarettes. $43.00 delivered. SOLD!

[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/BaseballCards003-8.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/BaseballCards004-7.jpg[/IMG]

I also have two T206s
Fred Abbott, Polar Bear, centered, light wrinkle at the bottom and a speck of paper loss just above the T in Toledo. Typical Polar Bear tobbacco staining front and back. $28.00 delivered
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/BaseballCards001-8.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/BaseballCards002-8.jpg[/IMG]

Fletcher, Piedmont 350, no paper loss but heavy creasing. $12.00 delivered
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/Baseballcards011-3.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i100.photobucket.com/albums/m10/northviewcats/Baseballcards012-3.jpg[/IMG]

First email that says I will take it--gets it.

Thanks,

Joe
